title: Auth-Status: Invalid login or password
content:
• passwords have been verified as valid
  • usernames have been verified as valid
  • webmail logins work perfectly
  • Thunderbird 64 bit stopped working after an update 3 days ago
  • NOT using a proxy or VPN - Windows 11 Home set to not use proxy
  • Thunderbird set to NOT use a proxy - auto-detect is off
  • Everything worked perfect prior to the update several days ago

I'm at a loss as to how to fix this issue - any suggestions would be very welcomed.

Webbi
creator: webbi

title: Just QUIT working today
content:
Today Thunderbird just quit working. It will show new messages in my accounts but will not display the message contents. Just a blank message pane. Also quit working with my Startmail account entirely. Also shows as busy in various accounts. What is really strange is that it was working perfectly at 1 this morning now just out of the blue I am dead in the water.

Any ideas ??
creator: Scorpn1
